chapters.title: Chapter 38:  The Place That Was Not
chapters.info: Somara, p. 808—Flaxen-haired Maiden of the Spear, of the Bent Peak sept of the Daryne Aiel. She is tall even among the Aiel and is the tallest among Rand's honor guard. She took part in Rand's beating. She is among the names Rand has on his list.
